creatures.name: Radiant, Serra Archangel
creatures.ability: As Radiant enters the battlefield, it ressurrects the first two creatures of type angel from your graveyard. If not enough creatures on your graveyard, two random angel creatures will be drawn to your hands.

creatures.name: Anafenza, Unyielding Lineage
creatures.ability: As Anafenza enters the battlefield, it deals two damage points against every creature on the enemy's battlefield including the enemy player.

spells.name: Pacifism
spells.ability: All creature cards in the enemy battlefield gets their power reduced to zero for the next two turns. This doesn't affect cards deployed after Pacifism was cast.
